description: Try our easy to follow Roast Vegetable & Tofu Curry With Banana Raita recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roast Vegetable & Tofu Curry With Banana Raita Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cup medium grain white rice, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 210Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.
Cut all vegetables into wedges and place in a large bowl.

Combine curry paste, 1 tbs lime juice and 1/4 cup coconut milk in a jug. Pour half the mixture over vegetables and toss well to combine. Transfer to tray and drizzle with oil. Roast for 3540 minutes, turning halfway through, or until tender and lightly charred.
Meanwhile, combine yoghurt, banana, coconut, sultanas and 1 tbs lime juice in a bowl and set aside.

Pour remaining paste mixture into a saucepan. Stir in remaining coconut milk, remaining lime juice and half the coriander. Bring to the boil over mediumhigh heat, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes. Cut tofu into 2cm pieces and add to curry, heating gently for 3-4 minutes.
Place vegetables on serving plates, spoon over tofu curry and scatter with remaining coriander. Serve with banana raita and rice.
